name: Groove'em Up
description:
Shoot these evil red spheres as colorful circles come at you. Follow the color and stay in the rythm.

Groov'em Up is a Shoot'em Up/Rythm Game made in 48 hours during the Mix And Game Jam 2020.

In the White Circles, press Left click to shoot.

In the Purple Circles, press Right Click to Dash.

In the Blue Circles, don't move.

In the Orange Circles, you have to move.

Destroy the red spheres by shooting at them.

Have fun !

(I created all the music of the game during these 48 hour, but none of the sound effects)
